info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 10:51AM MDT until March 18 at 11:30AM MDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southeastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado... Northern Wichita County in west central Kansas... Wallace County in west central Kansas... Western Logan County in west central Kansas... Greeley County in west central Kansas...
* Until 1130 AM MDT/1230 PM CDT/.
* At 1050 AM MDT/1150 AM CDT/, a dust channel was 5 miles south of Weskan, or 14 miles southwest of Sharon Springs, moving northeast at 55 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph.
SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported around 1/2 mile or less visibility near the Cheyenne Wallace and Greeley county lines.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
*
This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 136 and 152.
This dust channel will be near... Sharon Springs around 1100 AM MDT. Wallace around 1110 AM MDT.
Other locations impacted by this dust channel include Arapahoe and Selkirk.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 11:30 AM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 11:30 AM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne, CO; Greeley, KS; Logan, KS; Wallace, KS; Wichita, KS

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 11:30 AM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 11:30 AM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne, CO; Greeley, KS; Logan, KS; Wallace, KS; Wichita, KS
